mapper.sql: parentBranch.id parentBranchId, parentBranch.branch_name parentBranchName, parentBranch.branch_number parentBranchNumber, parentBranch.branch_grade parentBranchGrade, parentBranch.branch_inform parentBranchInform, childBranch.id childBranchId, childBranch.branch_name childBranchName, childBranch.branch_number childBranchNumber, childBranch.branch_grade childBranchGrade, childBranch.branch_inform childBranchInform
